description: A hearty spinach-and-ricotta filling enclosed in crunchy puff pastry? Yum! Serve with salad and salsa for a speedy dinner; on a platter as an appetiser for parties; or into lunch boxes as a yummy snack.
name: Sesame Spinach Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt 250g chopped frozen spinach, thawed, excess liquid removed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Grease and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Combine the spinach, ricotta, breadcrumbs, egg, onion and garlic in a large bowl. Season.

To make 2 rolls at a time, place pastry on a clean worktop surface. Spoon half the spinach mixture along one edge, leaving a 2cm border. Roll up to enclose filling and form a log. Trim ends. Cut in half. Place seam-side down on prepared tray. Repeat to make 4 rolls in total.
Brush with milk. Sprinkle with seeds. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown.
